using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;

namespace FontAwesome
{
    public class FontAwesomeIcon
    {
        public char Unicode { get; set; }
        public string[] Styles { get; set; }
        public string Url { get; set; }
        public string FaName { get; set; }
        public override string ToString()
        {
            return Unicode.ToString();
        }
    }

    /// <summary>
    /// The unicode values for all FontAwesome icons.
    /// <para/>
    /// See https://fontawesome.com/cheatsheet
    /// <para/>
    /// This code was automatically generated by FA2CS (https://github.com/matthewrdev/fa2cs).
    /// </summary>
    public static partial class FontAwesomeIcons
    {
$properties$

        private static Dictionary<string, FontAwesomeIcon> _all = new Dictionary<string, FontAwesomeIcon>();

        public static Dictionary<string, FontAwesomeIcon> All
        {
            get
            {
                if (_all.Keys.Count == 0)
                {
                    _all = InitAll();
                }
                return _all;
            }
        }

        public static Dictionary<string, FontAwesomeIcon> InitAll()
        {
$enumerable$
            return _all;
        }

    }
}
